patthana14.2:1.1: Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana14.2:2.1: Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana14.2:3.1: Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.2:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
